name: 10Web
description: 10Web is an AI-powered platform that simplifies WordPress website creation, hosting, and optimization for businesses and individuals.
longDescription: 10Web is an AI-driven platform designed to streamline the process of building, hosting, and managing WordPress websites without requiring coding expertise. Its mission is to democratize online opportunities by breaking down technical barriers, enabling users to create professional websites quickly and efficiently. The platform integrates AI to generate content, images, and fully functional websites in minutes, tailored to user specifications. It also offers automated hosting powered by Google Cloud, ensuring high performance, security, and scalability. 10Web serves freelancers, agencies, and businesses by providing tools like drag-and-drop editors and optimization features to enhance user experience and SEO. With over 50,000 active users, it focuses on simplifying website management while delivering fast, secure, and responsive sites.
features: AI Website Builder generates fully functional WordPress websites with content and images in minutes, requiring no coding skills.
Automated hosting on Google Cloud ensures 99.99% uptime, fast load times, and reliable performance for websites.
PageSpeed Booster optimizes websites to achieve a 90+ Google PageSpeed score, improving SEO and user experience.
Drag-and-drop editor based on Elementor allows easy customization of website design, content, and layout.
AI Co-Pilot provides real-time suggestions to enhance content creation and website optimization.
Ecommerce dashboard integrates WooCommerce for seamless management of online stores, products, and payments.
Automated backups ensure website data is securely saved and easily restorable, minimizing data loss risks.
Cloudflare Enterprise integration enhances security with SSL certificates, DDoS protection, and malware detection.
White-labeling feature enables agencies to offer 10Web’s services under their own brand, increasing client loyalty.
Real-time analytics track sales, conversions, and visitor behavior to optimize ecommerce strategies.
50+ premium widgets enhance website functionality, supporting features like forms, maps, and sliders.
Mobile-first designs ensure websites are fully responsive and optimized for all screen sizes.
AI-driven SEO tools automatically optimize websites for higher search engine rankings and increased traffic.

faqs.question: What is 10Web’s AI Website Builder?
faqs.answer: 10Web’s AI Website Builder creates fully functional WordPress websites with AI-generated content and images in minutes, customizable via a drag-and-drop editor.

faqs.question: Does 10Web offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web offers a one-week free trial to explore its AI website builder, hosting, and management tools without a credit card.

faqs.question: Can I use my own domain with 10Web?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web allows users to connect their own domain to websites built on the platform.

faqs.question: Is 10Web suitable for ecommerce websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web integrates WooCommerce and provides an ecommerce dashboard to manage products, payments, and orders efficiently.

faqs.question: How does 10Web ensure website security?
faqs.answer: 10Web implements SSL encryption, malware detection, DDoS protection, and regular security updates to safeguard websites.

faqs.question: Can I migrate an existing website to 10Web?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web offers one-click migration to move existing WordPress sites to its hosting, optimizing them for speed and performance.

faqs.question: Does 10Web support mobile optimization?
faqs.answer: Yes, all websites built with 10Web are automatically optimized for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless user experience.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support does 10Web provide?
faqs.answer: 10Web offers 24/7 customer support via live chat, with responsive and knowledgeable agents to assist users.

faqs.question: Can agencies use 10Web for client websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web provides white-labeling and a centralized dashboard for agencies to manage multiple client websites efficiently.

faqs.question: Does 10Web help with SEO?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10Web’s AI-driven SEO tools optimize websites for search engines, improving rankings and driving traffic.
